menu.title: menu
referrals.programOne: Join our unique referral program and start earning money with us! We provide you with a unique opportunity to become a partner of our crypto insurance platform and earn money by protecting cryptocurrency assets.
referrals.programTwo: Our mission is to ensure the safety of your cryptocurrency portfolio, and we invite you to share this mission with others. All you need to do is complete a simple verification on our platform and gain access to your referral account.
referrals.programThree: Register and get verified on our platform. Get access to your referral account, where you will find a unique referral link. Invite friends, colleagues and acquaintances to receive crypto insurance using your link. For each invited user who register and buy insurance, you will receive a generous bonus in the form of $.
referrals.programFour: Our bonuses are your chance to increase your income by simply recommending a reliable and high-tech way to protect cryptocurrency assets. Don't miss this opportunity to start earning money with us!
referrals.programFive: Join our team and help others protect their cryptocurrency assets. We value each of our partners and are ready to reward you for your participation.
referrals.programSix: Accept the challenge and start earning money today. Partnership with us is the path to financial independence and security in the world of cryptocurrencies!
referrals.programSeven: With us, you not only protect your own assets, but also help others ensure the safety of their cryptocurrency investments. Become our partner and start earning money today!
referrals.submittedText: Your request was submitted and will be reviewed. You will be notified by notification inside our application and emailed

dashboard.getInsuranceText1: We are an innovative and effective insurance solution. We marry the cryptocurrency market and the insurance market to ensure the profit security for all cryptocurrency owners.
dashboard.getInsuranceText2: We protect you from scam incidents and empower you to take responsibility for your digital assets. We also provide protection coverage against third-party cyber theft, data breaches and operational interruption.
dashboard.getInsuranceText3: Our technology comprises a team of the most professional specialists; their wide range of expertise span blockchain experts, cyber security experts, insurance experts and law enforcement agents.
dashboard.getInsuranceText4: We boast of a robust technology of private cryptocurrency experts who can protect and prevent you from losses associated with losing your phone, laptop or any access to your crypto wallets.
dashboard.insuranceText: You can submit insurance request at any time
